Articles.Content:
The Gn-22A is a next generation strike cruiser and escort ship. Its equipped with 4th generation armour and more efficient boost systems for considerably increased combat effectiveness.

Craft: https://www.dropbox.com/s/z5yhmouv3mspajy/Gn-22A%20Launcher.craft

Cost: 175,000 Kerbits

Mass: 104 Tons

TWR: 1.04

dV: 5,500m/s

Weaponry: 6 Hornet MK2 Missiles

The Launcher

Blasting into space

A Kerbal for scale

Dear lord! Remind me not to get on your bad side Mr Jenkins, ummm Sir. ...Er, I'll let myself out just don't hurt me, please.

Cupcake...
Nicely done. now duel it against your older ships!
So.. what does Gen 1-3 armor look like?

So.. what does Gen 1-3 armor look like?

I think of it as

gen-1:Splatterings of plates here and there.

gen-2:Strips of armor branching from one point(EG:Vanguard)

gen-3:Armor branching from a low impact spine running along the ship.(EG:Bayonet)

gen-4:Armor shell branching from a high impact spine(EG:Drek mk14)

I think of it as

gen-1:Splatterings of plates here and there.

gen-2:Strips of armor branching from one point(EG:Vanguard)

gen-3:Armor branching from a low impact spine running along the ship.(EG:Bayonet)

gen-4:Armor shell branching from a high impact spine(EG:Drek mk14)

That's pretty much it Though 4th also isolates the fuel tanks from the spine to improve shock absorption. I technically class the Drek MK14 as 3rd gen armour but its got so much of it that its way more effective than the Gn-22

I think of it as

gen-1:Splatterings of plates here and there.

gen-2:Strips of armor branching from one point(EG:Vanguard)

gen-3:Armor branching from a low impact spine running along the ship.(EG:Bayonet)

gen-4:Armor shell branching from a high impact spine(EG:Drek mk14)

My armor goes:

gen-1: Armor on fuel tank

gen-2: armor on fuel tank, double connectors

gen-3: armor on center truss.
My lotus class cruiser would def be gen 4. with a double layer of armor in some parts.
Shall we see if it can overcome the might of a Chimera-class carrier?
Might I ask why so magnificent a craft carries such a light armament? I want another ship with a MAC cannon!

Minerman: The chimera is huge! it would crush this thing which is only 300 parts fully armed. The chimera is ~700

Pirateofhterun: I'm working on a larger ship whith a railgun.

Might I ask why so magnificent a craft carries such a light armament? I want another ship with a MAC cannon!

I've almost finished a version with a small MAC! The subassembly feature is a godsend for this!
